meanings.sent1: She enjoys upsending balloons during celebrations.
meanings.sent2: The rocket was upsending into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved upsending a dove to the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: His spirits were upsending like a hot air balloon.
meanings.sent5: The elevator upsending to the top floor was a thrilling experience.

meanings.definition: The act of sending something upward.
meanings.sent1: The upsending of the kite brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the upsending of the hot air balloon was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The upsending of the confetti at the party was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The upsending of the prices left customers surprised.
meanings.sent5: The upsending of the graduation caps symbolized success and achievement.
